fields.name: Holy Crusade (Charge 250%):
fields.value: Attack every player who scored below you and whose alignment is different than yours.

fields.name: Shield of Scripture:
fields.value: Increase your target's defense power tonight, based on your standard deviation (<27.50% = 0.2x, >27.49% = 0.1x).

fields.name: Defender of the Faith (Passive):
fields.value: You are immune to roleblocks, redirection, and investigative modifiers; applied either to you or your target.
